Package com.varukha.webproject.model.dao

Interface UserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDAOImpl
public interface UserDAO
Interface UserDAO contain contracts of methods for interacting with the MySQL Database.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dmytro Varukha

    • findAllUsers

      List<User> findAllUsers() throws DAOException
      Method findAllUsers used to find all users from users database table.
      Returns:
      list of all users from database.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException.

    • findUserEmailPassword

      Optional<String> findUserEmailPassword(String email) throws DAOException
      Method findUserEmailPassword used to find user password by email.
      Parameters:
      email - user email address in which the search is performed.
      Returns:
      optional result of operation. Return user password if available and return empty if not.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException

      Method findUserByEmail used to find user by email.
      Parameters:
      email - user email address in which the search is performed.
      Returns:
      optional result of operation. Return user if available and return empty if not.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException

    • findUserById

      Optional<User> findUserById(long userId) throws DAOException
      Method findUserById used to find user by user id.
      Parameters:
      userId - user id in which the search is performed.
      Returns:
      optional result of operation. Return user if available and return empty if not.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException

    • addUser

      boolean addUser(User user, String encodedPassword) throws DAOException
      Method addUser used to adding new user to database.
      Parameters:
      user - contain user data that will be added to database.
      encodedPassword - contain encoded password data that will be added to database in order to data security.
      Returns:
      boolean result of operation. Return true if new user was added and false if not.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException.

    • topUpUserAccount

      boolean topUpUserAccount(long userId, String userAccount) throws DAOException
      Method topUpUserAccount used to top up user account in order to pay delivery service.
      Parameters:
      userId - user id in which the search is performed.
      userAccount - contain sum of money in order to top up user account.
      Returns:
      boolean result of operation. Return true if new user was added and false if not.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException.

    • payForDeliveryService

      boolean payForDeliveryService(String totalPrice, long userId) throws DAOException
      Method payForDeliveryService used to pay delivery service.
      Parameters:
      userId - user id in which the search is performed.
      totalPrice - contain payment sum for delivery service.
      Returns:
      boolean result of operation. Return true if payment was successfully and false if not.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException.
